long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your life with Simple Reminders! This user-friendly Chrome extension allows you to set reminders effortlessly, helping you stay organized and on top of your tasks. With a sleek design, you can choose from predefined intervals (15 min, 30 min, or 1 hour) or set a custom date and time using an intuitive date picker. Once your reminder is triggered, you'll receive a sound notification to ensure you never miss an important task. All reminders are stored locally, allowing you to view and manage them easily without relying on popups. Experience the power of productivity right in your browser with Simple Remindersâ€”your personal reminder assistant!
